en_title: Arrangement on Mutual Taking of Evidence in Civil and Commercial Matters between Courts of the Mainland and Hong Kong Special Administrative Region comes into force on March 1
zh_title: 《關於內地與香港特別行政區法院就民商事案件相互委託提取證據的安排》三月一日生效

en: The Arrangement on Mutual Taking of Evidence in Civil and Commercial Matters between the Courts of the Mainland and the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, signed on December 29, 2016, will come into force on March 1, 2017.

The Arrangement aims at assisting litigants of the Mainland and the HKSAR to obtain evidence in civil and commercial matters with enhanced efficiency and greater certainty. Letters of request received after the entry into force of the Arrangement will be governed by the Arrangement.
The full text of the Arrangement is available at the website of the
zh: 在二○一六年十二月二十九日簽定的《關於內地與香港特別行政區法院就民商事案件相互委託提取證據的安排》（安排）將於二○一七年三月一日生效。
安排的目的是協助內地與香港特别行政區的訴訟人在民商事案件中，能更有效和明確地取得證據。安排適用於在安排生效後收到的取證請求書。
